title: Bots in ARAM
body: Please just .. NO I just wound up the only guy on my team with 3 bots vs 3 players and 2 bots cause the other guy on my team had some issues.  and it wouldn't let me surrender .. and while that's the worst EVERY GAME I've had with aram and bots has been painful forme or the other guys. there are no good bot games cause bots FEED LIKE HELL in aram.  I'd rather wait twice as long for a game. I have not heard a SINGLE good thing about bots in aram games.  They honestly destroy the format for most of us.

i've seen a few of these names
i havent seen a bot in any game type after i hit level thirty

You're either very lucky or I am unlucky... I'm lvl 30 and see them often during the weekdays in ARAM and they usually don't get kills and intent feed.  Maybe it's the time of day u play vs. me?  They don't seem like Riot bots either... if so they need to program them more similar to their intermediate bots since I remember the game mode vs. bots that could turret hug etc...

Bots in aram have been around for ages. Level 30 bots in aram are new since patch 7.2.

Why not just put a captcha on accounts  that have consistently really bad k/d ratio (ignore assists). You seriously wouldn't piss off many real accounts coz someone that sucks that badly will either improve our quit.
dont play aram double ip weekend..... we'd be the Japanese fisherman, they'd be the Nomura jellyfish.
I reckon they should just make the bots actually half decent at the game if the waiting time to get into an ARAM with real people is too long. xx
We aren't talking about riot based bots, these are player bots.
I know but they just intentionally feed pretty much
I've been getting this too, really starting to become a problem. Since the 7.2 patch ARAMs are plagued with bots. Try blocking them, I've never been matched again with somebody I've blocked.
